Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ThermalSubsystem.description: This ThermalSubsystem schema contains the definition for the thermal subsystem of a chassis.
ThermalSubsystem.longDescription: This resource shall represent a thermal subsystem for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

FanRedundancy.description: The redundancy information for the groups of fans in this subsystem.
FanRedundancy.longDescription: This property shall contain redundancy information for the groups of fans in this subsystem.

Fans.description: The link to the collection of fans within this subsystem.
Fans.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type FanCollection.

Heaters.description: The link to the collection of heaters within this subsystem.
Heaters.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type HeaterCollection.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

ThermalMetrics.description: The link to the summary of thermal metrics for this subsystem.
ThermalMetrics.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ThermalMetrics.

title: #ThermalSubsystem.v1_1_0.ThermalSubsystem
